page.title: 07SHOPS AND SHOPPING
page.content: The arrival of Fine Fare Supermarket in Matlock has been very helpful to some people, but not everyone. When it was being built, people said "What will it look like stuck in the middle of the street?" They said it was too big for Matlock and should go to a bigger place. But most people shop there now because they find it cheaper and it's not far to go to get there. Some people even come from Chesterfield to shop at Fine Fare. My mum shops there because she doesn't have to walk home. She can catch a bus right outside Fine Fare and she's home in a jiffy. It's much easier by car too, because you can park your car on the top and get down to the shop by lift.
